Author: coffeeandnarcissism
Text: I’ve done that. The days where I stay home alone and pretend that I’m “working” so no one bothers me while I binge on ubereats, play games, and watch movies are seriously my favorite days.

Author: pinheadlardy
Text: I was a g&t kid when I was younger and the anxiety from school alone gave me the capability to make myself pale and cold sweat on command when I couldn't finish my hw so I could miss school lol. all last year I did the same thing but instead it was if I binged too much the night before and couldn't go to school bc of how bloated I was.
